## RoomName variable

The RoomName component renders the name of the connected LiveKit room inside a span tag.

**Signature:**

```typescript
RoomName: ({ childrenPosition, children, ...htmlAttributes }: RoomNameProps) => React.JSX.Element;
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <RoomName />
</LiveKitRoom>
```
